definition: radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.chinese: 未偵測到晶片組散熱器。

sentences.english: Smoke was used to simulate steam coming from a smashed radiator.
sentences.chinese: 用煙來模擬從撞碎的散熱器中冒出的蒸氣。

sentences.english: We need to radiator &condenser fan with blad and frame for kia pride.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要求購汽車散熱器，請聯繫我們。

sentences.english: The radiators began their quiet hissing.
sentences.chinese: 散熱器也開始了發出輕輕的嘶嘶聲。

sentences.english: Shall I put some anti- freeze in the radiator?
sentences.chinese: 要不要在散熱器裏注入一些防凍劑？

sentences.english: Model TSW-9025D/S radiator is applicable to all electronic cooling products.
sentences.chinese: 型散熱器，可適合所有電子製冷類產品的配套使用。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a heat radiator tube laying device for a water tank of a vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及一種汽車水箱散熱器布管裝置。

sentences.english: That means high idle current and big heatsink.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着很高的靜態電流和很大的散熱器。

sentences.english: The designs of chiller and radiator and unique , so the heat exchange efficiency is very high.
sentences.chinese: 冷凝器及散熱器設計獨，換熱效果特佳。

sentences.english: Pipes convey hot water from the boiler to the radiators.
sentences.chinese: 通過管道把熱水從鍋爐輸送到散熱器裏。

sentences.english: The radiator includes basis material for heat elimination, and multiple guide pillars for heat elimination.
sentences.chinese: 一種散熱器，其包括散熱基材以及多個散熱導柱。

sentences.english: Extrusion tool, method for manufacturing shaped article with fins, and heat sink.
sentences.chinese: 擠出工具，製造帶有翅片的成形件的方法，和散熱器。

sentences.english: This system is designed to control the electric heating.
sentences.chinese: 本系統是爲電採暖散熱器控制而設計的。

sentences.english: The heat is carried by cooling water to the radiator for dissipation.
sentences.chinese: 熱量由冷卻水帶至散熱器散發。

sentences.english: The blackness of a radiator expresses its radiant ability.
sentences.chinese: 散熱器的黑度表徵了散熱器輻射能力的大小。

sentences.english: The blackness of a radiator expresses its radiant ability.
sentences.chinese: 散熱器的黑度表徵了散熱器輻射能力的大小。

definition: valve (esp. tire valve)/accelerator (obsolete term for 油門|油门)/stigma (zool.)/spiracle
